messages.messageBody:
CHRISTIE'S SALE

There will be a viewing of 20 blades from the London sale in NY around September 15th (phone the NY office for details)

There will be a sale in NY in March 2005 of about 40 blades from the same Tosogu Museum as the London sale.

Alan

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
